relevant_findings.cardiovascular: RRR, Nl S1, S2, No MRG
relevant_findings.abdomen: Soft, very tender to mild palpation in left lower quadrant especially; tender to deeper palpation in LUQ. No tenderness in epigastric or right upper quadrants. Mildly tender in right lower. Rebound tenderness in LUQ, LLQ. No organomegaly. Normal bowel sounds present.
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm, well perfused, 2+ pulses, no clubbing, cyanosis or edema
relevant_findings.neurological: Grossly assessed to be normal, motor function grossly normal, AOx3

changes_over_time.abdominal_examination: Tenderness in left lower quadrant persistently noted with rebound tenderness in LUQ and LLQ.
changes_over_time.pulse: Decreased from 68 bpm to 54 bpm upon admission exam.
changes_over_time.blood_pressure: Increased from 116/60 mmHg to 126/86 mmHg upon admission exam.
